fields.description: A JSON.stringify-ed array containig all the field names that should be included in the component. Currently supported are: 'name', 'address', 'city'

address-form:submit.description: Fires when the user clicks the submit button.

value.description: An object containing the input data: name, firstName, address, cityCode, city, email, phone

address-form:validate.description: Fires when the form is validated.

value.description: A boolean indicating whether the input data is valid
